page.title: 10Hall Green Sports Centre
page.content: The Sports Centre was built in 1978 with help of an Urban Aid Grant. It has playing fields, a Trim-Trail for health concious joggers, floodlit outdoor tennis, netball and five-a-side soccer courts. A wide variety of indoor games are played; badminton, basketball, volleyball, netball, tennis, table- tennis, five-a-side soccer and roller skating. On weekdays the centre is used by schools between 9-00a.m. and 6-00 p.m. From 7-00p.m. to 10-00p.m.,and Saturday afternoons, & Sunday mornings, it is available for use by the general public either as clubs or individually. During school holidays recreational courses are organised for children, adults and families. It is possible to hire some sports equipment and the centre is well booked. Interestingly it is people who live outside the area who use most the facilities offered.
